name: Cherrim
description: The Blossom Pokémon. It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.description: During harsh sunlight, ally Pokémon within 30 feet of this Pokémon add their proficiency bonus to damage rolls.

abilities.name: Form Change (Cherrim)
abilities.description: Cherrim changes appearance depending on the weather. In strong sunlight, it blossoms into Sunshine Form.
